attributes.action: Put gangs, misbehaving youths and unproductive adults to better use
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why not bring back national service....youth ganges want to fire guns, why not train them and send them to the Middle East; ASBO Youths misbehave, have no purpose in life, nothing to do and no ambition, why not train them for the army thus giving them a role or responsibility, relevant life skills and a positive future. Adults who have been on jobseekers allowance for over six months should be forced to do the "the jobs that no one wants to do", yet most immigrants and refugees do happily, and if that fails again train them up for the Army so that they offer something back to their country which has given them so much!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
